channel.title: Basic configuration for user firewall setting?
channel.description: What is the basic usage to setup port forwarding via user firewall setting? I don't see it in whonix' documentation. Please point me in the right direction, thank you.

item.title: Basic configuration for user firewall setting?
item.dc:creator: omegamegaman
item.description:
Outgoing PF configuration?

Well… I am testing it out via Kali to Whonix Gateway workstation so I will need to set a LPORT for listener.

Read full topic
item.source: Basic configuration for user firewall setting?

item.title: Basic configuration for user firewall setting?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It’s very uncommon. Therefore not documented.

Port forwardings in the classical sense are not anonymous.

Unless you want to do some local thing (such as ssh from the host into
Whonix-Gateway/Workstation, which is documented), there is no use for it.

For incoming connections, there are:

Whonix

Hosting Location Hidden Services

Anonymous Hosting, Comparison Table of Tor Onion Services, VPN with Remote Port Forwarding, pagekite and Anonymous Third Party Hosts

Whonix

Onion Services

Anonymously host any server with Whonix and Tor onion services

Read full topic
